title: Night Owls with Jack Delroy
description: Before the infamous 1977 Halloween episode, Jack Delroy captured the hearts and minds of midnight America with an entertaining mix of interviews, music, and sketch comedy.
altHero: Jack Delroy in a tan suit, giving his opening monologue
alt1: Jack cheers with an elderly female guest by a big game show wheel
alt2: Jack sits with a guest: a black woman wearing safari clothes and holding an empty box
alt3: Jack and a woman dressed as cave people
alt4: Gus chases Jack with pie in his hand and all over his face
